data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 4,308 believers in the county of Chamoli to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Chamoli, Uttarakhand, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, make the 4,308 believers in Chamoli to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 387,292 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Chamoli, Uttarakhand, India who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, help 78 new simple churches start among the 391,600 people in the county of Chamoli, Uttarakhand, India. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Kayastha (Muslim traditions) people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Chamoli, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the county of Chamoli who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.section_summary:
the county of Chamoli, Uttarakhand, India has a population of 391,600.

We estimate Chamoli has 4,308 people who might know Jesus, 4,751 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 382,541 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Chamoli, Uttarakhand, India. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

location.people_groups_list: Gidhiya (Hindu traditions), Bhoksa, Rajput Kumaoni Thakur, Brahmin Upreti, Silpkar (Muslim traditions)
